snippet: Nelson Mandela, 94, the former president of South Africa, was responding to treatment according to a government statement on Tuesday.
abstract: Former South African Pres Nelson Mandela, who was hospitalized on December 8, is experiencing recurrence of lung infection and is reportedly responding to treatment; current hospital stay is longest in recent memory, raising fears that Mandela's condition is grave.
lead_paragraph: Nelson Mandela, 94, the former president of South Africa, was responding to treatment according to a government statement on Tuesday.
